title: Leaking with task spawning

labels.name: A-runtime
labels.description: Area: std's runtime and "pre-main" init for handling backtraces, unwinds, stack overflows

body:
Encounter this with the monitor task rustc uses:

```
-> % valgrind --error-exitcode=100 --soname-synonyms=somalloc=NONE --quiet --suppressions=/scratch/laden/rust/src/etc/x86.supp  --tool=memcheck --leak-check=full x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage2/bin/rustc --cfg stage2  -O --cfg rtopt --cfg debug -C prefer-dynamic --target=x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu  -D warnings -L "x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/rt" -L "/export/scratch/laden/rust/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/llvm/Release+Asserts/lib" -L ""  --out-dir x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage2/lib/rustlib/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib /scratch/laden/rust/src/libcore/lib.rs
==7008== 304 bytes in 1 blocks are possibly lost in loss record 493 of 713
==7008==    at 0x4C29590: calloc (vg_replace_malloc.c:618)
==7008==    by 0x4010F21: allocate_dtv (dl-tls.c:296)
==7008==    by 0x401162D: _dl_allocate_tls (dl-tls.c:460)
==7008==    by 0xA58EBD6: pthread_create@@GLIBC_2.2.5 (allocatestack.c:589)
==7008==    by 0x7E459D8: thread::imp::create::h036e85c8cd60d1ccjpd::v0.11.0.pre (in /export/scratch/laden/rust/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage2/lib/librustrt-d8560cb2-0.11.0-pre.so)
==7008==    by 0x7E4579D: thread::Thread$LT$$LP$$RP$$GT$::spawn_stack::hcbde5b06063f8b0bdld::v0.11.0.pre (in /export/scratch/laden/rust/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage2/lib/librustrt-d8560cb2-0.11.0-pre.so)
==7008==    by 0x7B9E011: task::spawn_opts::h0d304a454f0ac4b9Bce::v0.11.0.pre (in /export/scratch/laden/rust/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage2/lib/libnative-1fb5e2c0-0.11.0-pre.so)
==7008==    by 0x7B9DAC1: task::Ops.rt..Runtime::spawn_sibling::hacecbb09652e0114Ble::v0.11.0.pre (in /export/scratch/laden/rust/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage2/lib/libnative-1fb5e2c0-0.11.0-pre.so)
==7008==    by 0x7E44526: task::Task::spawn_sibling::h15964a90a1f22e1d96c::v0.11.0.pre (in /export/scratch/laden/rust/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage2/lib/librustrt-d8560cb2-0.11.0-pre.so)
==7008==    by 0x9EAF0C6: task::SiblingSpawner.Spawner::spawn::h6626632c2a97d2b9IAf::v0.11.0.pre (in /export/scratch/laden/rust/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage2/lib/libstd-59beb4f7-0.11.0-pre.so)
==7008==    by 0x5BB72DE: driver::monitor::haf599a6f8b273298Mmt::v0.11.0.pre (in /export/scratch/laden/rust/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage2/lib/librustc-d252d482-0.11.0-pre.so)
==7008==    by 0x5BB53B8: driver::main_args::h74ba63e40c33635csDs::v0.11.0.pre (in /export/scratch/laden/rust/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage2/lib/librustc-d252d482-0.11.0-pre.so)
==7008==
```

Seems like we're not calling `pthread_join` or something?

cc @alexcrichton
